channel.title: Categories on Log4j Exploitability Index
channel.description: Recent content in Categories on Log4j Exploitability Index

item.title: Siemens Mindsphere Cloud Application
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory Link https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Resources Resource Link source https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Vulnerability fixed on central cloud service starting 2021-12-11; no user actions necessary CISAGov Fixed on Cloud Version CISAGov Last Update: 12/15/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-18 12:01:20 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.

item.title: Siemens Mindsphere Cloud Foundry
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Although Cloud Foundry environment itself is not vulnerable, nevertheless it’s recommended to upgrade log4j-core to the latest available version if log4j-core is part of your project Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-18 12:01:20 NCSC-NL Updated community link source.
